name: Adventurer Ras
description: A living legend of Orbis who renounced his holiness
story: Faced with an otherworldly threat, Ras renounced his holiness and became Human in order to save Orbis. Now that he understands the true nature of power, he is able to fully utilize those granted to him by Diche and Ilryos as he looks ahead to new adventures.

relations.description: A companion who stayed by Ras's side through everything.
Ras may be the one who pays for his snacks, but Arky often seems to forget who's in charge around here.
Ras sees Mort as an opponent not to be taken lightly. At some point, he will have to kill Mort.

specialty.name: Blessings of the Gods
specialty.description: The love and blessings of the gods of Aethra remain with him.

costs.name: Reingar Student ID
costs.description: The personal information on this student ID was erased before it was discarded. It emits the endless desire for knowledge.

skills.name: X-Slash
skills.description: Attacks with a sword, dealing damage proportional to the caster's max Health.
skills.enhanced_description: Attacks with a sword, with 75% chance to dispel a buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

skills.name: Purifying Flame
skills.description: Strongly attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, before recovering the caster's Health and increasing Defense of all allies for 2 turns. Amount recovered and damage dealt increase proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhancements.description: Increases Health.
Increases Health by 5%.
Increases Health by 12%.
Increases Health by 20%.
Increases damage dealt by X-Slash.
Increases damage dealt by X-Slash by 2%.
Increases damage dealt by X-Slash by 5%.
Increases damage dealt by X-Slash by 10%.
Increases Speed.
Increases Speed by 1.
Increases Speed by 3.
Increases Speed by 6.
Increases Effectiveness.
Increases Effectiveness by 7%.
Increases Effectiveness by 15%.
Increases Effectiveness by 25%.
Has a chance to grant immunity to the caster and the ally with the highest Attack for 2 turns when using Command Strike.
Has a 20% chance to grant immunity to the caster and the ally with the highest Attack for 2 turns when using Command Strike.
Has a 50% chance to grant immunity to the caster and the ally with the highest Attack for 2 turns when using Command Strike.
Has a 100% chance to grant immunity to the caster and the ally with the highest Attack for 2 turns when using Command Strike.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 1%.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 2.5%.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 5%.
Has a chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 10% when using X-Slash.
Has a 20% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 10% when using X-Slash.
Has a 50% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 10% when using X-Slash.
Has a 100% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 10% when using X-Slash.
Has a chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 20% when using Purifying Flame.
Has a 20% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 20% when using Purifying Flame.
Has a 50% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 20% when using Purifying Flame.
Has a 100% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 20% when using Purifying Flame.
Increases amount of Health recovered when using Purifying Flame.
Increases amount of Health recovered by 20% when using Purifying Flame.
Increases amount of Health recovered by 50% when using Purifying Flame.
Increases amount of Health recovered by 100% when using Purifying Flame.
Has a chance to decrease Defense of the target for 1 turn when using Command Strike.
Has a 10% chance to decrease Defense of the target for 1 turn when using Command Strike.
Has a 30% chance to decrease Defense of the target for 1 turn when using Command Strike.
Has a 60% chance to decrease Defense of the target for 1 turn when using Command Strike.

common.name: Dual Attack
common.effect: Chance to attack an enemy with basic skill after an ally has attacked them with basic skill, unless unable to act. Cannot be triggered by counterattacks.

skill1.name: 斬撃
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: 指揮の一撃
skill2.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、攻撃力が最も高い味方に連携攻撃を付与する。
skill2.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃し、攻撃力が最も高い味方に連携攻撃を付与する。

skill3.name: 浄化の炎
skill3.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、自身の生命力を回復し、味方全体に防御力UPを2ターンの間付与する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージと回復量がUPする。
